text:
When the Sportsbook was introduced it was positioned as a place where people who didn’t understand the exchange could place bets. They had a mechanism called ‘Price rush’ that would shift bets to the exchange if it was better value.

Soon I worked out that bets were not reaching the exchange and it turn out that Betfair were managing that risk themselves. It wasn’t long before that link between the sportsbook and exchange completely broke.

I don’t expect it will return.
